message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
Let's be practical, Alice. I'm losing money faster with each round.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it closer to 55/45.  We both lose more the longer we wait.
Alice, this is my final offer. We both lose out if we wait any longer.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  We both stand to lose a lot more if we keep going.  I'm willing to give you a bit more than the last offer, but this is my final one.
Alice, I'm meeting you halfway. This is a fair deal considering the circumstances. Let's close this out.
